oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: "When You Get Home" American Red Cross booklet for returning WWI veterans
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Produced by Home Service of the American Red Cross, this primer provided information on readjusting to civilian life. It belonged to Pvt. Walter Golden of Overton County, Tennessee of Co. B, 119th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. Walter's brother, Bennie Golden, served in the same unit.
